home.title: Transform Your Space with Renovatipoint
home.subtitle: Redesign your home or office with our professional services

homeRenovation.title: Home Renovation
homeRenovation.subtitle: We renovate your living spaces and turn them into your dream home
homeRenovation.description: We add value to your home with our professional team and quality materials. From interior renovation to exterior work, structural improvements, and decorative touches, we meet all your home needs.

interior.title: Interior Renovation
interior.description: We renovate your interiors to be modern and functional.

exterior.title: Exterior Renovation
exterior.description: We renew your building's exterior appearance and increase its value.

structural.title: Structural Improvements
structural.description: We address your building's structural issues and enhance its safety.

discovery.title: Discovery and Planning
discovery.description: Our expert team visits your site, performs detailed inspections, and identifies your needs.

design.title: Design and Proposal
design.description: A custom design and budget plan is prepared, and a detailed proposal is presented to you.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: Our professional team carries out the renovation work according to the determined plan.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: After all work is completed, detailed quality control is performed and handed over to you.

cta.title: Contact Us for a Free Consultation
cta.description: Our expert team is ready to evaluate your project and offer custom solutions.

gardenDesign.title: Garden Design
gardenDesign.subtitle: Professional landscaping solutions bringing the beauty of nature to your home
gardenDesign.description: We offer tailored solutions with our experienced landscape architects and skilled gardeners to transform your garden into a year-round usable living space.

irrigation.title: Irrigation Systems
irrigation.description: We keep your garden always green with automatic irrigation systems.

furniture.title: Garden Furniture
furniture.description: We equip your garden with functional and aesthetic furniture.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Design
sustainable.description: We design sustainable gardens using eco-friendly materials and water-saving systems.

allSeasons.title: Year-Round Use
allSeasons.description: We select special plants for gardens that look beautiful and are usable in every season.

easyMaintenance.title: Easy Maintenance
easyMaintenance.description: We create low-maintenance gardens with smart systems and proper plant selection.

valueIncrease.title: Value Increase
valueIncrease.description: We increase the value of your property with professional landscaping.

cta.title: Free Consultation for Your Garden
cta.description: Our experts are ready to help you discover the potential of your garden.

specialProjects.title: Special Projects
specialProjects.subtitle: We bring your dream spaces to life with our professional team
specialProjects.description: We offer custom solutions for luxury residences, specially designed pools, smart home systems, and unique renovation projects. Let's create your dream living space together.

pool.title: Custom Pool Construction
pool.description: We add value to your living space with luxury and custom-designed pools.

smartHome.title: Smart Home Systems
smartHome.description: Integrated smart home systems allowing you to control all devices in your home.

attic.title: Custom Attic Design
attic.description: We transform unused attics into functional living spaces.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: We manage processes professionally with our experienced project managers.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.description: We develop unique and functional designs for each project.

qualityControl.title: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: We apply quality control processes according to international standards.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We offer eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient solutions.

cta1.title: Share Your Project With Us
cta1.description: Let us provide professional solutions for your special projects. Our expert team is ready to talk to you.

bodrumVilla.title: Bodrum Villa Renovation
bodrumVilla.description: Custom pool, landscaping, and interior design for a 450m² villa in Bodrum

istanbulPenthouse.title: Istanbul Penthouse
istanbulPenthouse.description: Custom design and smart home systems for a 300m² penthouse apartment in Nişantaşı

cta2.title: Contact Us for a Free Consultation
cta2.description: Our expert team is ready to assist you with your special project.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.commitment: At Renovatipoint, we are committed to protecting your privacy.
privacyPolicy.description: This privacy policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and protected when you use our services.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: Your personal data is protected using industry-standard security protocols and encryption technologies. Your data security is our top priority.

privacyCommitment.title: Privacy Commitment
privacyCommitment.content: We respect the privacy of our customers and do not share their personal information with third parties. Your data is used solely to improve our service quality.

kvkkCompliance.title: GDPR Compliance
kvkkCompliance.content: We comply with all legal requirements under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and process your data accordingly.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Collected data is used to improve our service quality, fulfill our legal obligations, and provide you with a better experience.

privacyPolicy.updateNotice: This privacy policy may be updated according to legal requirements and changes in our service conditions. You will be notified of significant changes.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: Please read these terms of service carefully before using Renovatipoint services. By using our platform, you agree to these terms.
termsOfService.listItem2: The user is responsible for account security.

legalFramework.title: Legal Framework
legalFramework.content: These terms of service regulate the legal relationship between Built Better and users, determining the rights and obligations of the parties.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Service fees, payment schedules, and our refund policy are determined and applied transparently.

privacySecurity.title: Privacy and Security
privacySecurity.content: The protection of your personal data and security measures during the service process are guaranteed in accordance with legal regulations.

serviceCommitment.title: Service Commitment
serviceCommitment.content: We make clear commitments regarding the quality and standards of our services and adhere to them.

items.1: 1.1. These terms govern the use of the Built Better platform.
items.2: 1.2. All services offered through the platform are subject to these terms.
items.3: 1.3. By using the service, users are deemed to have accepted these terms.
items.4: 1.4. Built Better reserves the right to change these terms with notification.

items.1: 2.1. Our services are provided according to professional standards.
items.2: 2.2. Project duration and costs are determined in advance.
items.3: 2.3. Change requests may incur additional fees.

items.1: 3.1. Payment schedule is determined at the beginning of the project.
items.2: 3.2. Interest surcharges may apply for installment payments.
items.3: 3.3. Cancellation and refund conditions are stated in the contract.
items.4: 3.4. Legal interest is charged for late payments.

items.1: 4.1. Responsibilities of both parties during the project process are specified.
items.2: 4.2. In case of force majeure, term extensions may be granted.
items.3: 4.3. Warranty for materials and workmanship is provided.
items.4: 4.4. Occupational safety measures are provided by us.

items.1: 5.1. Designs and projects belong to our company.
items.2: 5.2. No changes can be made to projects approved by the customer.
items.3: 5.3. Rights for reference use are reserved.
items.4: 5.4. Project images cannot be used without permission.

items.1: 6.1. Disputes are resolved primarily through negotiation.
items.3: 6.3. Legal action is used as a last resort.
items.4: 6.4. Competent courts are specified in the contract.

termsOfService.updateNotice: These terms of service may be updated according to legal requirements and changes in our service conditions. You will be notified of significant changes.
